values: A slice is a piece from something larger, such as a cake.
The girl enjoyed a slice of cake at her birthday party.
n. 薄片；部分；菜刀，火铲 vt. 切下；把…分成部分；将…切成薄片 vi. 切开；割破

To slice is to cut something into thin pieces.
A slice is a thin, flat piece of something that has been cut.
